sentences: Ma mõtlen kõik asjadest üle enne otsustamist.
Lapsed õpiti lugema ja arvutama asjadest.
context: The Estonian word 'asjadest' is the elative plural form of 'asi', which means 'thing'. The '-dest' suffix indicates movement away from something, so it translates to 'from things/about things'. This form is used when talking about topics or matters that originate from or concern various subjects.
